Subject: Meeting Feedback
Paragraphs:
Hi Cindy,

I wanted to get your thoughts on the meeting with the bigsoft team yesterday. I know it was a bit chaotic, but what did you think overall? Personally, I was shocked when Tom shouted like that. It was completely unexpected and really put us in an awkward position. I hope it doesn't affect our chances of moving forward with the collaboration.

Best regards,
Emily
